meanings.definition: Not characteristic of academic study or learning.
meanings.sent1: Her unacademic approach to solving problems often led to creative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The book's unacademic language made it easy for anyone to understand.
meanings.sent3: His unacademic way of explaining complex theories always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unacademic atmosphere of the workshop sparked new ideas in everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unacademic teaching style of the professor made the class unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Lacking in scholarly qualities or standards.
meanings.sent1: The unacademic paper was full of opinions rather than facts.
meanings.sent2: Her unacademic behavior in class surprised the other students.
meanings.sent3: The unacademic debate about aliens was both amusing and confusing.
meanings.sent4: His unacademic approach to leadership was like a ship without a compass.
meanings.sent5: The unacademic research lacked the depth needed for a scholarly article.
